info.title: Condominio API
info.description: Backend API for Condominio mobile application

post.description: Creates a new user account and profile. Returns JWT token for immediate login.
Authenticates user and returns JWT token with user profile.

patch.description: Update current user profile information. All fields are optional.

get.description: Admin sees all users, Board members see only their building users

post.description: Creates a new user with specified role (e.g. board member). User is auto-activated.

patch.description: Update user information. Only admins can change roles.

post.description: Submit a payment report with optional proof image. Payment will be in PENDING status until approved.

get.summary: Get payment summary with solvency status
get.description: Returns payment history, solvency status, pending periods, and recent transactions
Allows residents of the same unit, board members of the same building, and admins to view payment details.
Admin sees all payments, Board members see only their building payments

post.summary: Confirm and load invoices from Excel (Admin)

get.summary: Get unit balance and pending invoices
Get all invoices for a unit
Get all payments for a specific invoice
